data: {"About-Me":[{"Title":"A Clean Home = A Happy Home","Content":"Feel the difference a truly clean home makes. A spotless, welcoming space you can be proud of — without the stress. I focus on the details, work with honesty and precision, and take cleaning off your plate so you can focus on what matters most: living your life."}],"Services":[{"Service":"Basic Clean","Name":"Tidying Up","Description":"Replace trash bags"},{"Service":"Basic Clean","Name":"Tidying Up","Description":"Dust"},{"Service":"Basic Clean","Name":"Floors","Description":"Vacuum/sweep and mop"},{"Service":"Basic Clean","Name":"Kitchen","Description":"Wipe down kitchen appliances and sink"},{"Service":"Basic Clean","Name":"Kitchen","Description":"Counters"},{"Service":"Basic Clean","Name":"Bathrooms","Description":"Clean bathrooms"},{"Service":"Basic Clean","Name":"Windows","Description":"Window panes"},{"Service":"Basic Clean","Name":"Windows","Description":"Window sills"},{"Service":"Deep Clean","Name":"Kitchen & Appliances","Description":"Cabinets"},{"Service":"Deep Clean","Name":"Kitchen & Appliances","Description":"Inside appliances"},{"Service":"Deep Clean","Name":"Bathrooms","Description":"Clean shower heads"},{"Service":"Deep Clean","Name":"Bathrooms","Description":"Remove soap-scrum and limescale"},{"Service":"Deep Clean","Name":"Living Areas","Description":"Under furniture"},{"Service":"Deep Clean","Name":"Living Areas","Description":"Under couch and chair cushions"},{"Service":"Deep Clean","Name":"Windows & Doors","Description":"Window blinds"},{"Service":"Deep Clean","Name":"Windows & Doors","Description":"Window tracks"},{"Service":"Deep Clean","Name":"Windows & Doors","Description":"Window panes"},{"Service":"Deep Clean","Name":"Windows & Doors","Description":"Doors"}],"Promotions":[],"Services-Include":[{"Service":"Deep Clean","Includes (optional)":"*Includes Basic Clean"}],"Testimonials":[{"Name (optional)":"Regards, Curtis Bledsoe","Content":"Melinda is the Superwoman of housekeeping! She comes to the rescue! Prompt, professional and thorough! Melinda has been cleaning our home now going on two years. Whether it’s a larger detail clean (semiannual) or a more basic clean (monthly), we can leave our house knowing she will do a good job, returning hours later with the work done and the house locked up. A joy to work with."},{"Name (optional)":"Marcela Crawford","Content":"Melinda does a great job. She cleans thoroughly and very well. I will always hire her when I need help"}],"Service-Icons":[{"Service":"Tidying Up","Image Url":"./pictures/Services/Organization.svg"},{"Service":"Floors","Image Url":"./pictures/Services/Floors.svg"},{"Service":"Kitchen","Image Url":"./pictures/Services/Kitchen.svg"},{"Service":"Bathrooms","Image Url":"./pictures/Services/Bathroom.svg"},{"Service":"Windows","Image Url":"./pictures/Services/Window.svg"},{"Service":"Kitchen & Appliances","Image Url":"./pictures/Services/Kitchen.svg"},{"Service":"Living Areas","Image Url":"./pictures/Services/Living_Areas.svg"},{"Service":"Windows & Doors","Image Url":"./pictures/Services/Window.svg"}],"General":[{"Element":"First Button","Text":"REQUEST A QUOTE TODAY!"},{"Element":"Second Button","Text":"Get a Free Quote"},{"Element":"Email","Text":"mloukurtz19@gmail.com"},{"Element":"Phone","Text":"479-966-9094"},{"Element":"Instagram","Text":"https://www.instagram.com/always_clean_1123?utm_source=ig_web_button_share_sheet&igsh=ZDNlZDc0MzIxNw"},{"Element":"Facebook","Text":"https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100092655759980"},{"Element":"Fully Insured","Text":"Fully insured for your peace of mind"},{"Element":"First Picture","Text":"./pictures/IMG_3125.jpeg"},{"Element":"Second Picture","Text":"pictures/img-carousel/1000016414.jpg"},{"Element":"Logo","Text":"./pictures/AC_Logo.svg"},{"Element":"Title","Text":"Always Clean"}]}
